docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: logistic_map(x0, r, n)
docs.text:
Computes the logistic map sequence for a given initial condition, growth rate and number or iterations

x_{n+1} = r * x_n * (1 - x_n)

docs.title: Paramerters
docs.text: x0: float Initial value of the sequence r: float Growth rate parameter n: int Number of iterations to calculate

docs.title: Returns
docs.text:
array of length n

Arrays of the values generated by the logistic map

Source code in handout_4_logistic_map/logistic_map.py 
def logistic_map(x0, r, n):
    """
    Computes the logistic map sequence for a given initial condition, growth rate and number or iterations

    x_{n+1} = r * x_n * (1 - x_n)

    Paramerters
    -----------
    x0: float
        Initial value of the sequence
    r: float
        Growth rate parameter
    n: int
        Number of iterations to calculate

    Returns
    -------

    xs: array of length n
        Arrays of the values generated by the logistic map

    """

    xs = np.empty((n))
    xs[0] = x0

    for i in range(1, n):

        xn = xs[i-1]
        xnp1 = r*xn*(1-xn)

        xs[i] = xnp1

    return xs
